question: 毎日
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>日</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

<vocabulary>Every day</vocabulary> you watch your favorite program, <reading>My</reading> <reading>Nietzsche</reading> (<ja>まいにち</ja>). It's a <vocabulary>daily</vocabulary> cartoon about Nietzsche and his life, which you follow religiously. Oh how much you love Nietzsche.
